backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing multiple frontend feature requirements and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend source files and their roles in the app.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide covering prerequisites and setup flow for building and running the project.
frontend/env.json: Runtime config specifying the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color system, themes, and component visuals.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document linking fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing core features and linking to development instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root rendering the GoalsDashboard and global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Centered pop‑up notification component with timed auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Large modal handling selfie capture, camera flow, image compositing, saving memories, and notifications.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown component providing social media sharing and download actions for monthly memory images.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: Renders a circular SVG progress donut showing a percentage using OKLCH colors and smooth animation.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Dialog for selecting a month with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Builds a yearly goals summary table with per‑month stats, checkbox tracking, celebration modal triggers, and memory loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
Wraps useCamera to manage video readiness, preview state, stream events, and safe photo capture with timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for backend query hooks; no logic implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and custom UI styling for summary tables.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Generates a Polaroid‑style composite selfie by loading images, drawing them on a canvas, and exporting a JPEG data URL.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Provides utilities to share monthly memory images using Web Share API with fallbacks for download, social links, and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, clearing, and listing month-tagged memory images in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Exports the list of month names and a Month type derived from them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Renders predefined goal-category cards with goal CRUD, completion handling, and month assignment logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for the project.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for node-side builds, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite config with React plugin, env injection, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s features, versioned state, and summaries of implemented UI workflows and functionality.
